resources.string: Our goal is to showcase each of our members as accomplished and capable individuals, and to elevate our identities as a team.
I am an artist from Queens, passionate about all forms of art who is currently working to fuse my interests in tech and design into a viable and successful career.

Caroline hails from Flushing, and is a garlic fiend to no one’s surprise. There’s a reason why she’s always chewing gum. She expects to live until she’s 101 as a spritely elderly lady. And in between, build some unforgettable codes - both insanely good and terribly bad.

Linda is 28 years old, fluent in Spanish and English and a mother of two. She recently got engaged,had her second daughter, and got accepted into this coding program (2018 has been a great year!). On her down time she enjoys watching Netflix, going to Target, and making Starbucks runs (Vanilla chai all day). In the future, she hopes to have a lucrative career with the opportunities to move from her home on Long Island to a place with a much warmer climate year round.
Born in Nepal and currently residing in Queens with my family. I am many things to many people, but I am most proud to be a good son and a loving brother.
